member.name: T:EMission.Api.Models.Validators.CountryCodeValidatorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a field cannot be null or empty string, contains exactly 2 alphabetic characters, and exists within the list of ISO country codes from IsoCountryCodes.json.
member.exception: Thrown on application start up if the ISO country codes file could not be found or read.

member.name: T:EMission.Api.Models.Validators.EnumValidatorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a field is required and exists as a value in the given enum.
member.exception: Thrown if the provided object is not an enum.

member.name: M:EMission.Api.Models.Validators.EnumValidatorAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.exception: Thrown if the object provided is not an enum.

member.name: T:EMission.Api.Models.Validators.GreaterThanZeroValidatorAttribute
member.summary: Validates that the value of the Property decorated with this attribute is not a null or empty string, contains exactly 2 alphabetic characters, and exists within the list of ISO country codes from IsoCountryCodes.json.
member.exception: Thrown on application start up if the ISO country codes file could not be found or read.

member.name: T:EMission.Api.Models.Validators.RequiredValidatorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a field is required.
